categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Worm was a person of unidentified species who was only five feet tall. This person was seen in Depatar, the City of Masks, in 31 BBY. Like all the visitors and many inhabitants, this person was in disguise, particularly with hundreds of holo-projectors under the suit to simulate a covering of living, crawling worms around the body. Worm approached other dancers to scare them, and then laughed out loud in their faces.
